subject: Re: to zack/Jeff   Re: [EVP-ITC] Ovilus question and feed back needed PLEASE
author: Marlboro63@aol.com
full_text:
-------------------------------1221586546
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Hi Ron,
 
The best results came from mode 3.  read my review of it on 
_www.paranormalpython.com_ (http://www.paranormalpython.com)  and it will  explain it all.
 
jeff
 
 
In a message dated 9/16/2008 12:33:53 P.M. Central Daylight Time,  
ronriko@... writes:

 
 
 
Which mode are you using for those results 1, 2 or  3.  I get nothing in 
Alpha mode 1 or the mix mode 3.   ron

--- On Tue, 9/16/08, Marlboro63@..., 9/16/08, <Marlboro63@...> wrote:

From:  Marlboro63@...<Marlboro63@...>
Subject:  Re: [EVP-ITC] Ovilus question and feed back needed PLEASE
To:  EVP-ITC@yahoogroupsTo: 
Date: Tuesday, September 16, 2008,  9:18 AM


 
 
Hi Zack,
 
Read my review of the Ovilus 1.  The common mistake is that  everyone turns 
it on and expects to get immediate results.  Well  all that comes out is random 
names and what some people may term  "garbage" at that time.  You have to let 
the spirits around  you learn how to communicate thru the box and this can 
take a good 30  to 60 minutes.  At that time all the randomness will have died  
down and you can now start to communicate thru the Ovilus 1.  If  this step is 
overlooked then you just sit there staring at this unit  thinking you just 
pissed away $200.00.  And that is not the  case.  It takes time for the spirits 
to learn how to communicate  regardless of what device is used.  Now if you 
use this device in  the same location over and over again you only have to do it 
 once.  When I first got mine it was spewing out all kind of  random garbage 
that made sense.  But once I did this the  communication flowed fluently.  It 
even gave me the name of the  little girl who's spirit inhabits our house and 
when I called her name  after hearing it this little girl came and stood in 
the hallway  looking at me in amazement.  The best was when my cat jumped up  by 
me and the Ovilus 1 and wanted attention the Ovilus 1 said "good  cat".  Then 
when my dog ran into the room and wanted my attention  over the cat the unit 
said "bad dog", LOL.  So it does work and  ask around to people who have them 
about their experiences.
 
Jeff
 
 
In a message dated 9/16/2008 11:01:21 A.M. Central Daylight Time,  
w9sz@prairienet. org writes:

 
 
 

Hi Jeff,

Interesting. As I said, I haven't used one  yet.

I just have a lot of suspicion about devices that  generate phonemes as 
opposed to actual sounds received. I'm sure  some spirits can make them 
produce messages but they could also  produce something out of random 
sounds. That's what I'd be  worried about. Might sort of come out like 
James Joyce's  Ulysses.
:-)

Zack

On Tue, 16 Sep 2008, _Marlboro63@aol. com_ (mailto:Marlboro63@...)   
wrote:

> Zack,
>
> I can attest to the  opposite regarding the Ovilus 1. The last time I used
> mine  it gave me full statements. It was referring to contact someone  and
> labelled them by name and told me why. then why I did  contact that person 
I knew
> why I was suppose to contact  them. And that person was all the way across
> the  country.
> The unit does work when it is given sufficient time  to set up.
>
> Jeff
>
>
>
> In a  message dated 9/16/2008 7:59:50 A.M. Central Daylight Time,
>  _w9sz@prairienet. org_ (mailto:w9sz@...)   writes:
>
>
>
>
>
> I haven't  treid one of those things yet, but based on the theoy of it  I
> suspect it is much morelikely to generate "words" from  randomities and
> things that weren't in fact words. It  wouldn't be considered reliable
> evidence by any serious  researchers.
>
> Zack
>
> On Tue, 16 Sep  2008, juswitchy wrote:
>
>> Was jus wondering what  you all thought of the Ovilus and the puck? I
>> was really  thinking of buying one and was jus looking for feed back  or
>> a tip on something  better..
>>
>>
>> Blessed  Be
>>
>>  Jus~Witchy
>>
>
>
>
>
>
>

blog,

(http://www.stylelist.com/trends?ncid=aolsty00050000000014) )
